instruction: Design an app for the given purpose and list its features.
input: An app to help seniors learn tech basics
output: The app will be targeted to seniors and will feature step-by-step tutorials for navigating and using a variety of technology devices. It will feature interactive, task-based video tutorials for basic tech skills such as setting up wireless networks, using streaming services, installing new software updates, and more. The app will also feature a helpful search bar to easily access tutorials, educational articles and more.
